Fruits are a great source of vitamins and minerals. Oranges, lemons, and tangerines are packed with vitamin C, which helps to boost the immune system and protect against infection. They also contain vitamin A, which helps to maintain healthy skin and eyesight.

Oranges are a good source of vitamin C, as well as other vitamins and minerals such as thiamin, riboflavin, folate, potassium, and calcium. Lemons are also a good source of vitamin C, as well as other vitamins and minerals such as potassium, calcium, and magnesium. Tangerines are a good source of vitamin A, as well as other vitamins and minerals such as potassium, calcium, and magnesium.
